item.title: AI Hiring Tools Are Advising Women and Minorities to Ask for Lower Pay in Salary Negotiations
item.description: Researchers tested 5 leading AI models on obtaining salary ranges, and they told user profiles set up as white men to ask for the most money.

item.title: Here’s What’s in Trump’s U.S.-Japan Trade Deal
item.description: Japanese autos will be subject to a 15 percent tariff, down from a punishing 27.5 percent.

item.title: How Do I Adjust to Not Being the Boss Anymore?
item.description: Old leadership habits die hard, but can complicate career transitions.
